data.event: The city was founded in 1900 as Elmo, but changed its name to Marion in 1902.

event.title: changed its name to Marion in 1902

data.event: The city was founded in 1900 as Elmo, but changed its name to Marion in 1902.

event.title: 2002, when eventual owner Red River Valley & Western filed

data.event: The line was in place in Marion until 2002, when eventual owner Red River Valley & Western filed for abandonment.
Marion was mentioned on the March 5, 2014 episode of "Wheel of Fortune."
